sentences.sContent: He has been charged with extortion and abusing his powers.
sentences.sCn: 他被控犯有敲诈勒索罪和滥用职权罪。

synos.tran: 勒索；[法]敲诈；强夺；被勒索的财物

words.tran: 敲诈；侵占；强求；牵强地引出

trans.tranCn: 勒索, 敲诈, 强取, 被勒索的财物
trans.tranOther: Extortion is the crime of obtaining something from someone, especially money, by using force or threats
